summary: A complete and realistic retexture of the Draugr.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7336/9162912568_045c347de9_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1][center]Have you ever wondered how a dead body is when it spend a lot of years in a polar climate?![/center]

[center]Based on some researches I have created my own retexture for the vanilla\'s Draugr and their armours.[/center][/size]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7394/9160756801_124892eff4_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2807/9160761811_a239355a78_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3705/9162977788_fc8d13de57_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5460/9163192332_0e90bfef7f_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7343/9145459740_f8815ae56d_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3667/9145454726_149cc50012_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]As [u]optional file[/u] you can choose:

HD Hair[/size]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5533/9181405239_27039c813b_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2890/9183618292_30132a7c87_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]No Effects on Draugr and Skeletons eyes (many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541]mrjentipede[/url] for the big help)[/size]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5481/9186605034_490b549264_m.jpg[/img][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7440/9184385945_3e325694b8_m.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]For better immersion without the Effects on Draugr and Skeletons eyes, you can download this version of the textures, with realistic dead eyes.[/size]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3812/9187248906_07807b8191_m.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5507/9187249368_92290ca3af_m.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]If you\'re searching for red and devil eyes, go [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37830]here[/url].[/size]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3738/9208242082_b9fb3f44e6_o.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7319/9159422022_43eb8c16dd_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3717/9157668167_0a422c6403_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7310/9159891948_0aa1293e66_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31731][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7316/9154439606_13892df1d4_n.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7418/9161521174_bbda1e7b46_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30173][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3750/9162034418_de96ddaeb8.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5531/9157438047_2843e1bb5f_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32561][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7338/9166673649_aa0f4829b3.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5469/9168331409_5ac84abb6b_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32182][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5523/9169624372_cc462c502e.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/9159613122_98a9535e37_o.jpg[/img][/center]
